typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Contract_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Execution_Date as string,
		Termination_Date as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as string,
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type_Code as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Contract_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Execution_Date as date,
		Termination_Date as date,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as decimal(19,4),
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalContract
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type_Code,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalContract derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Execution_Date,Termination_Date,Company_Name,Contract_Value,Contract_Currency,Contract_Type,Executed_By_Entity1,Executed_By_Entity2)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Contract_ID = Contract_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Execution_Date = Execution_Date,
		Relation_Termination_Date = Termination_Date,
		Relation_Company_Name = Company_Name,
		Relation_Contract_Value = Contract_Value,
		Relation_Contract_Currency = Contract_Currency,
		Relation_Contract_Type = Contract_Type,
		Relation_Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity1,
		Relation_Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity2,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndNumber derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Execution_Date,Termination_Date,Company_Name,Contract_Value,Contract_Currency,Contract_Type_Code,Executed_By_Entity1,Executed_By_Entity2)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Contract_ID == Relation_Contract_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingContract@NewContract select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type_Code,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Contract_ID = toInteger(Contract_ID),
		Execution_Date = toDate(Execution_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Termination_Date = toDate(Termination_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Contract_Value = toDecimal(Contract_Value, 19, 4, "###,###.##")) ~> ConvertDatesAndNumber
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingContract@(NewContract, ChangedContract, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingContract@ChangedContract derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID = Relation_Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type_Code,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Contract_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Execution_Date as date,
		Termination_Date as date,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as decimal(19,4),
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Incident_Id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Contract_Type_Code,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow
